caption.p: Effects of RosA on oxidative inactivation of ACO. (A) Statistical results of RosA reducing the oxidative inactivation of ACO activity in myocardial I/R area. (B) Statistical results of RosA reducing the oxidative inactivation of ACO activity after OGD/R injury in cells. Data are expressed as the mean ± S.D. ( n = 3). Significance was determined by ANOVA followed by Tukey’s test. ** p < 0.01 vs. Vehicle + I/R or Vehicle + OGD/R.
